```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

install.packages("readxl")
install.packages("dplyr")
install.packages("ggplot2")
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

```

```{r}
Sargo <- read_excel("DatosDesove.xlsx", sheet = 1)


```

```{r}

# HISTOGRAMAS

hist(Sargo$No_of_eggs, main = "Número de huevos por desove de de sargo", xlab = "Cantidad de huevos (n)", ylab = "Frecuencia")
hist(Sargo$Water_Temp, main = "Temperatura del agua de reproductores de sargo", xlab = "Temperatura (°C)", ylab = "Frecuencia")
hist(Sargo$Day_length, main = "Fotoperiodo natural", xlab = "Horas de luz", ylab = "Frecuencia")

```

```{r}

str(Sargo$No_of_eggs)
table(Sargo$No_of_eggs)

str(Sargo$Water_Temp)
table(Sargo$Water_Temp)

str(Sargo$Day_length)
table(Sargo$Day_length)


```











```{r}

ggplot(Sargo, aes(x = No_of_eggs)) +
  geom_histogram()

ggplot(Sargo, aes(x = No_of_eggs)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(color = month))

```
